description: The Falcon Lake cycling trails are situated on the Canadian Shield and offer very technical riding over rocks, but also plenty of easy to moderately difficult double track cross country ski trails, and gravel roads. Some short steep climbs/descents.
directions: The Falcon Lake cycling trails are located 160 km east of Winnipeg at the Falcon Ridge Ski and Recreational Area on the south side of Falcon Lake.  Park at the base of the downhill ski hill.  Ride to the top of the ski hills to access trails.
title: Falcon Lake
